hero.coachingText: Accelerate your career growth with personalized guidance from industry experts. Our coaches provide tailored strategies, skill development, and networking opportunities to help you reach your professional goals.
hero.internshipText: Gain real-world experience with hands-on internships designed to prepare you for success in your field.
hero.mvpText: Work on real startup projects, build your MVP, and learn how to turn ideas into scalable products.

about.title: Develop your skills and make a bigger impact with Grow Edge
about.description: Customized training, hands-on internships in real companies, and funding opportunities for innovative ideas — all to accelerate your career path and move from student to professional.

features.goalOrientedDesc: Structured learning paths to quickly enhance your qualifications.
features.projectSuccessDesc: Practical mentorship and partnerships with training and hiring companies.

alt.work: A young man holding a laptop and smiling

footer.brandDesc: Connecting talent with opportunity. We bridge the gap between ambition and achievement through career coaching and internships.
footer.copy: © 2025 Grow Edge. All rights reserved. Made with ❤️ by Grow Digital

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our platform, services, and process.

items.question: What is Grow Edge?
items.answer: Grow Edge connects students and professionals with career coaches and startup internships to help them gain real-world experience.

items.question: How can I apply for an internship?
items.answer: Simply visit our Internships page, browse available opportunities, and submit your application directly through the platform.

items.question: Are the coaching sessions online or in-person?
items.answer: Most of our coaching sessions are conducted online for flexibility, but some mentors also offer in-person meetings.

items.question: Do I receive a certificate after completing an internship?
items.answer: Yes, Grow Edge provides an official certificate of completion for all verified internship programs.

items.question: Can companies partner with Grow Edge?
items.answer: Absolutely! We welcome partnerships with startups and organizations looking to mentor or host talented individuals.

careerCoaching.title: Career Coaching
careerCoaching.subtitle: Explore one-on-one guidance to help you build a successful career.

startupInternships.title: Startup Internships
startupInternships.subtitle: Gain hands-on experience through internships at innovative startups.
